Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Commerce[ENDCOLOR] provides bonuses to empires focused on [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Commerce allows you to earn Great Merchants 25% faster. Unlocks building Big Ben.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all Policies in the Commerce tree will grant you +2 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route slots and double [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Great Merchant Trade Missions. It also allows the purchase of Great Merchants with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.
